title: Mickelson to miss Masters for first time in 28 years
description: Three-time champion Phil Mickelson is set to miss the Masters next month for the first time in 28 years.

title: Anderson has 'made peace' with England omission
description: England's leading Test wicket-taker James Anderson says he has "made peace" with being dropped for the West Indies tour.

title: A young soldier's funeral and a city facing starvation - Ukraine war daily round-up
description: Fears that Russia wants to starve Mariupol into surrender, and a young soldier isolated from his family is buried.

title: 'What he said is very, very dangerous' - Sutton says Lampard may regret Everton criticism
description: Everton manager Frank Lampard may regret criticising his struggling squad and questioning their courage, says Premier League-winning striker Chris Sutton.

title: Ukraine war: Russian soldiers fire on Kherson protesters
description: Protesters in Kherson scattered as explosions are heard and shots were fired by Russian soldiers.

title: Mariupol: Why Mariupol is so important to Russia's plan
description: The most bombarded city in Ukraine’s war with Russia is key to Moscow’s military campaign.

title: Just Stop Oil: Why protesters are tying themselves to goalposts
description: Football matches recently have been disrupted by activists who have crashed the pitch.

title: Smacking children in Wales becomes illegal
description: Critics say the law was pushed through by "those who think they know better than parents".

title: Free-range eggs no longer available in UK due to bird flu
description: They will be relabelled "barn eggs" because hens have been kept inside for weeks to tackle bird flu.

title: China Eastern: Plane carrying 132 people crashes in Guangxi hills
description: The Boeing 737 crashed into a hillside in southern China, and there are fears no one survived.

title: Scotland: Sunderland striker Ross Stewart, Hearts defender Craig Halkett & St Johnstone keeper Zander Clark called up
description: Sunderland's Ross Stewart and Hearts' Craig Halkett have been called up by Scotland for the first time as injury cover along with St Johnstone keeper Zander Clark.

title: Woman accused of murder after body find appears in court
description: Fiona Beal is accused of killing Nicholas Billingham between 30 October and 10 November.

title: Pakistan spinners bamboozle West Indies to get first World Cup win
description: Watch highlights as Pakistan shock West Indies to claim their first Women's World Cup win for 13 years in a rain-reduced 20 over match.

title: Sabita Thanwani killing: Family pay tribute to 'irreplaceable angel'
description: Relatives of Sabita Thanwani say she was "ripped away from those who loved her so very dearly".

title: La Liga: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang scores twice as Barcelona thrash Real Madrid
description: Watch highlights as Barcelona thrash Real Madrid 4-0 in La Liga's El Classico match at the Bernabeu, featuring goals from Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang, Ronald Araújo and Fernando Torres.

title: Morad Tahbaz: British-US national detained in Iran on hunger strike
description: The family of Morad Tahbaz, who has cancer, says it is distraught that Iran has not yet freed him.

title: Fossil fuel rush due to war is madness - UN
description: UN Secretary General says climate goals are in danger if countries turn to coal because of Ukraine.

title: Ukraine conflict: Russia trying to starve Mariupol into surrender - MP
description: Russia issued an ultimatum offering to open humanitarian corridors in exchange for the surrender of the city.

title: War in Ukraine: Protesters in Kherson appear to make Russian truck reverse
description: Footage shows civilians protesting against Russian occupation in Kherson on Sunday.

title: Pakistan shock Windies to boost England's World Cup semi-final chances
description: Off-spinner Nida Dar takes a career-best 4-10 as Pakistan claim their first Women's World Cup win for 13 years against West Indies.

title: David Beckham hands Instagram account to Ukrainian doctor
description: Ex-footballer says he wants to highlight work being done by medical professionals in the conflict.

title: Covid: Spring booster jab launches for over-75s and high risk in England
description: Experts say it will help keep the most vulnerable protected against severe illness amid rising infections.

title: Ukraine conflict: Russian shelling blamed for corrosive gas leak
description: The ammonia leak has been contained but prompted a warning residents should stay indoors.

title: Covid trapped me at home for more than seven months
description: But a vaccine - the first time one has been used to treat Covid - set Ian Lester free.

title: El Clasico: Reborn Barcelona rekindle magic with Real Madrid rout
description: Barcelona rekindle the magic of El Clasico as they end Real Madrid's dominance with a superb victory at the Bernabeu.

title: 'There isn't progress' - England statement 'dishonest' says Monye
description: The Rugby Football Union's claim that England made "solid progress" during the Six Nations is "dishonest", says former wing Ugo Monye.

title: Anger and grief as crowds rally to support Child Q
description: Hundreds of people marched through north London. Their message? Let black girls be black girls.

title: Loan sharks trap poorest as cost of living crisis bites
description: Illegal lenders in England are preying on the most vulnerable in society, says a report.

title: The lonely funeral of a young soldier in Ukraine
description: As Dmytro Kotenko was laid to rest, his parents were 600 miles away, trapped under Russian bombs.

title: The hunt for Nigerians who can change into cats
description: One man is challenging Nigerians' belief in magic after a wave of killings that has gripped the country.

title: Oscars 2022: Five ways the Academy is trying to stay relevant
description: The Academy Awards return this Sunday, but they face a battle to raise their viewing figures.

title: Not smart but clever? The return of 'dumbphones'
description: Why sales of very basic mobile phones, without apps and internet connection, are increasing.

title: Africa Eye exposes dodgy driving licences and dangerous vehicles on Kenya’s killer roads.
description: Kenya’s road accidents and deaths are on the rise, Africa Eye reveals cracks in Kenya’s road safety systems.

title: E-waste: Royal Mint wants to turn your old phone into gold
description: The Royal Mint has found a way to turn old circuit boards from phones, computers and televisions into gold.

title: Omicron vs Zero-Covid: How long can China hold on?
description: China's worst outbreak in two years has got some questioning how long it can hang on to its strategy.
